title: cannot see my chroma for teemo
body: i picked cottontail teemo to select my pink chroma skin and then I didn't see the chroma pack for teemo at all

replies.body: There's a known issue with selecting chromas in certain rotating game modes. Can you clarify if this is happening everywhere or just in specific modes for me?

Hello, first of all,  can you try and repair your client:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

If bug still persists, please send a ticket to the Player Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
